changelog.message: visualize there is more content to scroll to by fading out the first/last line
changelog.author: pandur

changelog.message: it will now also visualize arrays of arrays and objects
changelog.author: pandur

changelog.message: Added stride input. Force a stride for display. Default value 0 will not change stride at all. Will display an error if the stride is not compatible with the arrays length
changelog.author: pandur

changelog.message: New version v2: will now show scrollbars and a slider for scrolling
changelog.author: pandur

summary: Show the contents of the input array in a table in the patch, useful for debugging
